summary: This module defines a PyTorch implementation of a capsule network, including a layer that converts convolutional feature maps into primary capsules and a full model that stacks digit capsule layers, performs routing, and computes a margin‑based loss for classification.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use capsule network architecture for training and evaluating image classification models, supporting research, experimentation, and educational demonstrations of capsule routing and margin loss concepts.
